mapper.update:
update mall_supplier
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_region_name = #{sendRegionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update mall_supplier set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_region_name = #{sendRegionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mall_supplier m WHERE 1=1
AND m.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%' )

SELECT
FROM mall_supplier m WHERE 1=1
AND m.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%' )
ORDER BY m.update_time DESC LIMIT #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mall_supplier m WHERE 1=1
AND m.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%' )

SELECT
FROM mall_supplier m WHERE 1=1
AND m.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%' )
ORDER BY m.update_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
mapper.insert:
insert into mall_supplier_sysuser
id,
sys_user_id,
mall_supplier_id,
type,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sysUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{mallSupplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{type},
mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.company_name as companyName,s.type as ruleType FROM mall_supplier_sysuser s LEFT JOIN mall_supplier m on s.mall_supplier_id = m.id WHERE s.sys_user_id = #{userId} limit 1
SELECT r.id AS id, r.sys_rule_id AS sysRuleId, r.mall_supplier_id as mallSupplierId FROM mall_supplier_rule r WHERE r.mall_supplier_id = #{mallSupplierId}
mapper.insert:
insert into mall_supplier_rule
id,
sys_rule_id,
mall_supplier_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sysRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{mallSupplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.select: select DISTINCT r.id, r.parent_id as parentId, r.rule_code as ruleCode, rule_name as ruleName, rule_type as ruleType, rule_desc as ruleDesc, rule_url as ruleUrl, rule_order as ruleOrder, rule_picture as rulePicture, rule_ext as ruleExt, lft, rgt from mall_supplier_rule rr LEFT JOIN sys_rule r on r.id=rr.sys_rule_id where rr.mall_supplier_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into mall_supplier_role
id,
sys_role_id,
mall_supplier_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sysRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{mallSupplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mall_supplier m WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY m.update_time DESC
select u.login_name from sys_user u left join mall_supplier_sysuser s on u.id = s.sys_user_id where s.mall_supplier_id = #{id} and s.`type` = 1
